extendedInfo.description: "This is a game that demands pride of place on your phone." - 9/10 Eurogamer"It's still simple, but bloody brilliant. You won't play many better than Denki Blocks" - 5/5"Denki Blocks truly succeeds as a puzzle game" - 4.5/5 FingerGaming"Deep enough to hold your interest and keep you thinking long after most games would have been cleared out to make space for something newer" - 4/5 Square Go- - - -The multiple award-winning puzzler is back in a new sticky form!Denki Blocks! is a puzzle game like no other. Slide sticky blocks around a board and join the same colours together to solve puzzles. BUT! There are two important twists that make this game so special:1. All blocks not fixed or obstructed will slide.2. Blocks of the same colour stick together when they touch.This delicious taster version of Denki Blocks! contains 16 puzzles to get you in the mood. The DELUXE version of Denki Blocks! features...- Over 100 beautiful puzzles to enjoy, each hand-crafted for maximum pleasure.- Beat clever Master Challenges such as making shapes and besting move or time pars.- Complete over 100 Master Challenges to earn Denki Stars and open up secret puzzles.- Enjoy our delightful audio soundtrack.- Solve the puzzles to reveal pretty pictures.Please email us with questions or feedback. Try our other awesome HD & 3D Games. Whether you want a puzzle, arcade, action, strategy or casual game, we've something entertaining for you:* In TileStorm highly addictive puzzles of path construction against the clock are great brain training as you guide Eggbot the Robot through a jungle of challenges. Pocket gold coins in TileStorm Eire as you need to slide the tiles to guide our robo hero from spire to castle on an Irish adventure in another beautiful brain teaser. Or bag a jewel or two in TileStorm Polar in a super new Tile Storm story. Free Lite version [Massive Hadron]* Fight for survival over a night in the city with a gun & torch as your only defense (defence) against an angry zombie hoard in Aftermath XHD. Attack or run? It's your choice. [Two Heads]* Glide through the air like a paper plane (or the birds!) as you race flying at high speed from tower to tower in Ground Effect Pro X HD. Enjoy virtual physics, acceleromoter control and stereoscopic 3D. [Glenn Corpes]* Slice, dice, cut, chop, pop and flick blobs of color goo in Mixt. Includes bonus MP3 music track by DJ Shur-i-kan to enjoy as you mix the bubbles of coloured paint [Uprising]* Fun for kids and all the family alike. Farm fruit in Frootrees as you flick, throw and toss the Froot to harvest them using your poker skills to balance risk & reward. Just a hint of south park. Or try the Freaky Halloween Edition [Tin Man]* Be a cool snowboard ninja and smash the course record in Snow Dude. Don't tank your jump! [Lycette Bros]* A retro glow awaits you in Spirit - carve space with your touch* Shave face like never before in Magnetic Shaving Derby [Brandon Williamson]* For sports fans, check out Big Cup Cricket and Big Hit Baseball FREE from our friends at Beautiful Game Studios.Small Print: VAT added if bought within EU. Game may require license from Google and collect anonymous stats for quality purposes. If u get error "Unknown reason -18", please email us or google for solution. Dev tested on devices from HTC, Samsung, Motorola, Sony Ericsson incl Xperia Play, Droid, Galaxy & Desire Z.

reviews.title: Repetitive music mandatory
reviews.comment: Need badly parameters to remove music and keep in game sounds. I can\'t stand this music more than  2 minutes. Uninstalled. By the way I\'ve seen more adds than the game in these 2 minutes.
reviews.author: Julia Noites

reviews.title: Commercials?? Please!
reviews.comment: You must think highly of your game to believe I will watch 2 30 second commercials (!!!) And exit 3 full-screen ads to play 3 levels. LOL, no way.
reviews.author: govegg K

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: But it toooo much ads.....fedup with ads aids.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh... gets very tedious after just seven levels.
reviews.comment: The \"cutesy\" interface doesn\'t help either, no way is this another Tetris.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredibly goood
reviews.comment: Loved this on gba, well worth a couple of bucks to play again on my tablet. Even on later puzzles you will find yourself having to find new strategies to deal with the challenges. This keeps it fun and makes this one of the best puzzle games of all time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome but
reviews.comment: Would give five if there was more to the demo. I have fell in love with Jakyl apps. All these games are fun, just wish you had a few more for free for those of us that cant afford the apps but.... Please mind way worth it to save a lil and buy.... Ill be buying Denki blocks because I enjoy it so much. As I said, just wish there were more free apps too for those who cannot purchase or afford it. Would be nice for longer demos and maybe a few free apps with ads :)
reviews.author: Juliet Scalio

reviews.comment: Very compelling and addictive. Unsure whether to plump for the full version, but it brought back memories of playing this on Sky w/Beehive Bedlam etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Oh my this has to be the BEST brain teaser out there.  Give me an aspirin and let\'s play again. HTC Sensation 4G
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gameplay is quite nice but the control is sluggish & horrible

reviews.comment: Looks like a bad porting to Android

reviews.comment: Its a good game kept me interested and entertained on long journeys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Level menu is slightly sluggish when sliding, but gameplay is excellent. Galaxy s 2.3.3.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Noisy
reviews.comment: Would be nice if there were some way to turn off the music. Right now, the only option is to mute media entirely on the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game ruined by ads
reviews.comment: Please stop putting ads in these games. If you don\'t want to put out a free version then just charge for it as normal, but stop putting these infuriating ads in.
reviews.author: Jagjit Dusanjh

reviews.comment: Game is good but if you wabt the full game don\'t buy this one just simply download one of the free gba emulators and get the rom for this game you don\'t have to pay for it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Denki
reviews.comment: Lovely game but freezes on Sony Xperia S on ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User
